detail_desc: Joggers in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with elastication and a decorative drawstring at the waist and ribbed hems.
Watch in stainless steel with an adjustable leather strap and metal buckle. Width of strap approx. 2 cm, total length 23 cm. Diameter of watch 3.6 cm.
Trunks in stretch cotton jersey with flatlock seams, short legs, an elasticated waist and lined front.
Loose-fitting top in a lustrous Tencel™ lyocell-blend weave in a V-cut at the top with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps.
Pyjamas in soft, patterned cotton jersey. Top with short, flounced sleeves. Shorts with an elasticated waist and gathered frills at the hems.

Soft velour ballet shoes with a matching elastic hairband. Shoes with an elastic strap over the foot and a decorative bow at one side.Cotton jersey linings and insoles and soft velour soles. Hairband decorated with a large, glittery fabric flower.

Joggers in stretch cotton twill with an elasticated drawstring waist, low crotch and fake fly. Side pockets, welt back pockets and gently tapered legs with shaping seams at the knees and elasticated hems.

Blouse in a softly draping weave with a round neck and small opening at the back with a concealed button at the back of the neck. Gathered seams on the shoulders, long batwing sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Fine-knit jumper in a soft silk and cotton blend with a ribbed collar, button placket and long raglan sleeves with ribbed cuffs.

Knee-length dress in a Tencel™ lyocell weave with a collar, buttons down the front and a yoke with a pleat at the back. Short cap sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, flap chest pockets, a tie belt at the waist, and a rounded hem.
Fully lined patterned bikini. Triangle top with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps that cross at the back, a plastic fastener at the back and a frill-trimmed hem. Matching bikini bottoms.

Rain trousers in wind- and waterproof functional fabric with welded seams, reflective details and adjustable elastic braces with plastic fasteners. Elastication at the back of the waist, press-studs at the sides, elasticated hems and a reinforced elastic strap under the feet. Unlined. The trousers have a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
Blouse in an airy cotton weave with a V-neck, decorative seam down the front, gathered, front-facing shoulder seams and short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups.
Long-sleeved blouse in woven fabric with a deep V-neck, covered buttons at the top, two elasticated seams at the waist and decorative ties at the sides of the hem.

Set with a shirt and pair of trousers in cotton. Long-sleeved shirt with a collar, buttons down the front, chest pocket and buttoned cuffs. 5-pocket, regular fit trousers in soft, brushed twill with an adjustable elasticated waist and zip fly and button.
Leotard in glossy jersey with decorative gathers at the top, crossover straps at the back and 3/4-length sleeves. Lined gusset.
Short-sleeved sports top in fast-drying functional fabric.
Short dress in patterned chiffon with a V-neck, small stand up collar with a tie and long puff sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Tapered waist, flared skirt and a concealed zip in the side. Lined.
Court shoes in imitation suede with pointed toes, imitation leather linings and insoles and rubber soles. Covered heels 8 cm.
Long-sleeved dress in a soft, fine knit with decorative hole-knit details, a seam at the waist and flared skirt with a lace trim.
Long-sleeved top in soft linen jersey with a V-neck and rounded hem. Longer at the back.
Skinny-fit treggings in superstretch twill with an elasticated waist, fake front pockets and real back pockets.

Calf-length, V-neck dress in a viscose weave with concealed buttons down the front, a stand-up collar with decorative gathers at the front and short, wide sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups. Seam at the waist with gathered sections front and back, narrow elastication at the back and a detachable tie belt. Flared skirt. Unlined.
Elasticated scrunchies in velour with shimmering plastic beads.
Chunky, metal anchor chain necklace with a pendant. Adjustable length approx. 45-55 cm.

Long, sleeveless dress in an airy, softly draping weave with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and smocking at the back. Draping and a wrapover at the top with a gentle V-neck and frill trim at the sides. Lined.
Thong briefs in lace with a low waist, lined gusset, narrow sides and string back.
Short shorts in soft organic cotton jersey with an elasticated drawstring waist, and side pockets.
Soft, non-wired, push-up bra with decorative straps and moulded, padded triangular cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Adjustable shoulder straps, elasticated hem and no fasteners.
Lined, non-wired bikini top. Wide shoulder straps with a decorative ring, and cups with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support. Covered elastication at the hem. No fasteners.
Straight-cut, double-breasted jacket in cotton twill with notch lapels, flap front pockets and decorative buttons at the cuffs. Lined.
Patterned swimsuit with flounce-trimmed shoulder straps.
Shorts in lightweight, printed sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, slightly lower crotch and fake fly. Side pockets, a back pocket and knee-length legs with raw-edge hems.
Sun hats in an airy cotton weave with ties under the chin. Width of brim 4.5 cm. Lined.
5-pocket jeans in washed, stretch cotton denim with a high waist, zip fly and slim legs.
Wide, round-necked blouse in an airy cotton weave with covered buttons at the top, long raglan, balloon sleeves and narrow cuffs with a covered button.

Imitation suede boots with an open section at the back with an adjustable tab with concealed elastication and a metal buckle. Satin linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles. Heel 7.5 cm.
Joggers in soft sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and a back pocket. Low crotch and tapered legs with decorative stitching at the knees and ribbed hems.
Shirt in a cotton weave with a button-down collar, buttons down the front and yoke with a pleat at the back. Open chest pocket, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Scarf in a patterned weave that can also be tied as a hairband. Size 55x55 cm.
Short-sleeved shirt in a cotton weave with a collar, buttons down the front and rounded hem. Contrasting colour on the inside of the collar stand.
Jacket in soft fleece designed to be worn as a thermal mid layer. High collar and a zip down the front with a chin guard. Unlined. The jacket is made partly from recycled polyester.
Shorts in printed, lightweight sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist and raw-edge hems.
Small pouch bag in sturdy imitation leather with a zip at the top. Size 9.5x13 cm.
Oversized top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a lined drawstring hood, dropped shoulders and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Short, sleeveless dress in sturdy jersey with a low-cut back, seam at the waist and flared skirt. The polyester content of the dress is partly recycled.
Short, off-the-shoulder jumper in a soft, rib-knit viscose blend with long raglan sleeves, a wide ribbed trim around the neckline and raw edges at the cuffs and hem.
T-shirt in printed cotton jersey.
Jacket in washed stretch denim with a collar, buttons down the front, flap chest pockets with a button and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs.
Shirt in a viscose weave with a collar, buttons down the front and a yoke with a pleat at the back. Chest pocket and long sleeves with narrow buttoned cuffs. Gently rounded hem.
Set with a rib-knit hat and a scarf in woven fabric with a lightly brushed finish and fringes along the short sides.
Treggings in stretch fabric, one pair in denim, and one pair in twill. Elasticated waist, a fake fly, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
T-shirt in soft jersey with a round neck, short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, and a rounded hem.
Shortie briefs in soft jersey made from a cotton blend with a mid waist, lined gusset and medium coverage at the back.
Jumper in a soft, fine, airy knit with a V-neck and long raglan sleeves. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem, and short slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Slightly shorter jumper in a soft, fine knit with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Sleeveless top in a crinkled viscose weave in a narrow cut with gathers at the top. Short, narrow shoulder straps, and opening and button at the back of the neck and a lace trimmed hem.
Bikini briefs in lace with a low waist, lined gusset and medium coverage at the back.
Short-sleeved bodysuits in soft organic cotton jersey with lapped shoulders and press-studs at the crotch.
Rib-knit hat in a double layer of soft cotton with an appliqué on the sewn-in turned-up hem.
Hat and tube scarf in soft, patterned cotton jersey.
Cami top in a viscose weave with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and lace at the front.
Waist belt in imitation leather with a metal buckle. Width 3 cm.
Sports joggers in sturdy sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, taped details and side pockets. Tapered legs with shaping seams at the knees for extra mobility and wide ribbed hems.
Bucket hat in cotton twill with an inner sweatband. Width of brim 6 cm.

V-neck blouse in soft patterned jersey with a small stand-up collar and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Gathered yoke at the back,gathers at the shoulders and an elasticated seam at the back of the waist. The blouse is made from recycled polyester.
5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in washed, sturdy denim with an extra-high waist, button fly and straight legs. The cotton content of the jeans is partly recycled.
Straight-cut blouse in a crêpe weave with a stand-up collar decorated with imitation pearls. Concealed zip at the back and long sleeves with wide, buttoned cuffs.
Long-sleeved top in soft, slub cotton jersey with an appliqué on the front and short slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
5-pocket jeans in washed, superstretch denim with a regular waist, zip fly and button, and skinny legs.
Leggings in soft cotton jersey with covered elastication and a decorative bow at the waist and a narrow frill trim down the front of the legs.
Thong briefs in microfibre with a wide lace trim at the top. Low waist, lined gusset and a string back.
Cropped, wide T-shirt in cotton jersey with a drawstring at the hem. Ribbed neckline and dropped shoulders.
V-neck jumper in a soft, fine knit with a brushed finish. Dropped shoulders and long, wide sleeves.
50 denier tights with reinforcement at the top for a shaping effect on the tummy and thighs.
Bikini briefs in cotton jersey with a mid waist, lined gusset and medium coverage at the back.
Running vest top in fast-drying functional fabric with mesh sections and a racer back.

Ankle-length off-the-shoulder dress in an airy viscose weave with concealed elastication and a wide flounce at the top that continues around the arms. Gathered seam at the waist, a soft, detachable belt with a ring fastener, and an airy skirt with a seam at the hem. Unlined.
Ankle boots with a zip at the back. Cotton twill linings and insoles and smooth soles. Heel 6 cm.

Playsuit in woven fabric with adjustable shoulder straps, a foldover hem at the top and a concealed zip at the back. Narrow, elasticated seam at the waist and a detachable belt with metal rings. Front pockets with foldover edges. Unlined.
